news.title: Trump to double tariffs on steel imports
news.summary: The US president says increasing them to 50% will protect local industry and reduce reliance on China.

news.summary: A government source says the defence secretary has "full confidence" in Labour's plans to increase defence spending.

news.summary: A second child has been taken to hospital after sustaining serious injuries.

news.title: Astronauts in space for nine months didn't know if they would 'be able to make it back'

news.title: How Bondi mass killer slipped through the cracks in Australia

news.title: How controversial US-Israeli backed Gaza aid plan turned to chaos
